trans-unit.source: Provides credentials for password-based authentication schemes such as basic, digest, NTLM, and Kerberos authentication.
The <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential> class is a base class that supplies credentials in password-based authentication schemes such as basic, digest, NTLM, and Kerberos.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential> classe é uma classe base que fornece credenciais nos esquemas de autenticação baseada em senha como basic, digest, NTLM e Kerberos.

trans-unit.source: Classes that implement the <xref:System.Net.ICredentials> interface, such as the <xref:System.Net.CredentialCache> class, return <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential> objects.
trans-unit.target: As classes que implementam o <xref:System.Net.ICredentials> interface, como o <xref:System.Net.CredentialCache> classe, retorne <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential> objetos.

trans-unit.source: This class does not support public key-based authentication methods such as Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) client authentication.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não oferece suporte a métodos de autenticação baseada em chave pública, como autenticação de cliente do Secure Sockets Layer (SSL).

trans-unit.source: The following code example associates a <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential> object with a set of Uniform Resource Identifiers (URIs) in a <xref:System.Net.CredentialCache>.
trans-unit.target: O código a seguir exemplo associa um <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential> do objeto com um conjunto de Uniform Resource Identifiers (URIs) em um <xref:System.Net.CredentialCache>.

trans-unit.source: It then passes the <xref:System.Net.CredentialCache> to a <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> object, which uses it to authenticate requests to an Internet server.
trans-unit.target: Ele passa a <xref:System.Net.CredentialCache> para um <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> objeto, que usa para autenticar solicitações para um servidor de Internet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> class.
The default constructor for the <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential> class initializes all properties to `null`.
trans-unit.target: O construtor padrão para o <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential> classe inicializa todas as propriedades para `null`.

trans-unit.source: The user name associated with the credentials.
The password for the user name associated with the credentials.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> class with the specified user name and password.

The constructor initializes a <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential> object with the <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential.UserName%2A> property set to `userName` and the <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential.Password%2A> property set to `password`.
trans-unit.target: O construtor inicializa um <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential> do objeto com o <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential.UserName%2A> propriedade definida como `userName` e <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential.Password%2A> propriedade definida como `password`.

trans-unit.source: The `password` parameter is a <xref:System.Security.SecureString> instance.
trans-unit.target: O `password` parâmetro é um <xref:System.Security.SecureString> instância.

trans-unit.source: If this constructor is called with the `password` parameter set to `null`, a new instance of <xref:System.Security.SecureString> is initialized, If secure strings are not supported on this platform, then the <xref:System.NotSupportedException> is thrown
trans-unit.target: Se este construtor é chamado com o `password` parâmetro definido como `null`, uma nova instância da <xref:System.Security.SecureString> é inicializado, se não há suporte para cadeias de caracteres seguras nessa plataforma, o <xref:System.NotSupportedException> é gerada

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.SecureString" /> class is not supported on this platform.
The user name associated with the credentials.
The password for the user name associated with the credentials.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> class with the specified user name and password.

The constructor initializes a <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential> object with the <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential.UserName%2A> property set to `userName` and the <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential.Password%2A> property set to `password`.
trans-unit.target: O construtor inicializa um <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential> do objeto com o <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential.UserName%2A> propriedade definida como `userName` e <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential.Password%2A> propriedade definida como `password`.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential> object using the specified user name and password.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria um <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential> usando o nome de usuário especificado e a senha do objeto.

trans-unit.source: The user name associated with the credentials.
The password for the user name associated with the credentials.
The domain associated with these credentials.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> class with the specified user name, password, and domain.

The constructor initializes a <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential> object with the <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential.UserName%2A> property set to `userName`, the <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential.Password%2A> property set to `password`, and the <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential.Domain%2A> property set to `domain`.
trans-unit.target: O construtor inicializa um <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential> do objeto com o <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential.UserName%2A> propriedade definida como `userName`, o <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential.Password%2A> propriedade definida como `password`e o <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential.Domain%2A> propriedade definida como `domain`.

trans-unit.source: The `password` parameter is a <xref:System.Security.SecureString> instance.
trans-unit.target: O `password` parâmetro é um <xref:System.Security.SecureString> instância.

trans-unit.source: If this constructor is called with the `password` parameter set to `null`, a new instance of <xref:System.Security.SecureString> is initialized, If secure strings are not supported on this platform, then the <xref:System.NotSupportedException> is thrown
trans-unit.target: Se este construtor é chamado com o `password` parâmetro definido como `null`, uma nova instância da <xref:System.Security.SecureString> é inicializado, se não há suporte para cadeias de caracteres seguras nessa plataforma, o <xref:System.NotSupportedException> é gerada

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.SecureString" /> class is not supported on this platform.
The user name associated with the credentials.
The password for the user name associated with the credentials.
The domain associated with these credentials.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> class with the specified user name, password, and domain.

The constructor initializes a <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential> object with the <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential.UserName%2A> property set to `userName`, the <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential.Password%2A> property set to `password`, and the <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential.Domain%2A> property set to `domain`.
trans-unit.target: O construtor inicializa um <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential> do objeto com o <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential.UserName%2A> propriedade definida como `userName`, o <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential.Password%2A> propriedade definida como `password`e o <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential.Domain%2A> propriedade definida como `domain`.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the domain or computer name that verifies the credentials.
The name of the domain associated with the credentials.
trans-unit.target: O nome do domínio associado às credenciais.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential.Domain%2A> property specifies the domain or realm to which the user name belongs.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential.Domain%2A> propriedade especifica o realm ao qual pertence o nome de usuário ou domínio.

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is the host computer name where the application runs or the user domain for the currently logged in user.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, isso é o nome do computador host onde o aplicativo é executado ou o domínio do usuário para o usuário conectado no momento.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential.Domain%2A> property to set the domain associated with the credentials.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa o <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential.Domain%2A> propriedade para definir o domínio associado às credenciais.

trans-unit.source: to get the system domain.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o domínio do sistema.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermissionAccess.Read" />
trans-unit.target: Enumeração associada: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermissionAccess.Read" />

trans-unit.source: Returns an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> class for the specified authentication type.
The URI that the client provides authentication for.
The type of authentication requested, as defined in the <see cref="P:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule.AuthenticationType" /> property.
Returns an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> class for the specified Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) and authentication type.
A <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> object.
The following code example uses the <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential.GetCredential%2A> method to retrieve a <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential> object for the specified URI.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa o <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential.GetCredential%2A> método para recuperar um <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential> objeto para o URI especificado.

trans-unit.source: The host computer that authenticates the client.
The port on the <c>host</c> that the client communicates with.
The type of authentication requested, as defined in the <see cref="P:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule.AuthenticationType" /> property.
Returns an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> class for the specified host, port, and authentication type.

A <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> for the specified host, port, and authentication protocol, or <see langword="null" /> if there are no credentials available for the specified host, port, and authentication protocol.
The value of `authType` corresponds to the <xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule.AuthenticationType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor de `authType` corresponde do <xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule.AuthenticationType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the password for the user name associated with the credentials.
The password associated with the credentials.
trans-unit.target: A senha associada às credenciais.

trans-unit.source: If this <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> instance was initialized with the <paramref name="password" /> parameter set to <see langword="null" />, then the <see cref="P:System.Net.NetworkCredential.Password" /> property will return an empty string.
trans-unit.target: Se essa instância <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> tiver sido inicializada com o parâmetro <paramref name="password" /> definido como <see langword="null" />, a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Net.NetworkCredential.Password" /> retornará uma cadeia de caracteres vazia.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential.Password%2A> property to set the password associated with the credentials.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa o <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential.Password%2A> propriedade para definir a senha associada com as credenciais.

trans-unit.source: to get the user password.
trans-unit.target: Para obter a senha do usuário.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: Enumeração associada: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the password as a <see cref="T:System.Security.SecureString" /> instance.
The password for the user name associated with the credentials.
trans-unit.target: A senha para o nome de usuário associado às credenciais.

trans-unit.source: If an application attempts to set the <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential.SecurePassword%2A> property to `null`, a new instance of <xref:System.Security.SecureString> is initialized, If secure strings are not supported on this platform, then the <xref:System.NotSupportedException> is thrown
trans-unit.target: Se um aplicativo tentar definir o <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential.SecurePassword%2A> propriedade `null`, uma nova instância da <xref:System.Security.SecureString> é inicializado, se não há suporte para cadeias de caracteres seguras nessa plataforma, o <xref:System.NotSupportedException> é gerada

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.SecureString" /> class is not supported on this platform.
Gets or sets the user name associated with the credentials.
The user name associated with the credentials.
trans-unit.target: O nome de usuário associado às credenciais.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential.UserName%2A> property to set the user name associated with the credentials.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa o <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential.UserName%2A> propriedade para definir o nome de usuário associado às credenciais.

trans-unit.source: to read the user name from the system.
trans-unit.target: para ler o nome de usuário do sistema.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermissionAccess.Read" />
trans-unit.target: Enumeração associada: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermissionAccess.Read" />
